message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll be thrilled with the value it brings.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm still confident this product is worth more than $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll still get great value from it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11000. I'm willing to go up to $10000, but that's my maximum. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $10000. However, I'm still not willing to sell it to you for that price. I'm willing to make one more offer to try to find a mutually beneficial agreement. I'll offer it to you for $10500. It's a slight increase, but I think it's still a fair price considering the value this product brings.
